mapper.select: select `id` as id, `name` as name, `description` as description from sys_role where deleted = 0

select sr.id, sr.name, sr.description, sr.create_time, sr.update_time from sys_role sr left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = sr.id where sr.deleted = 0
and sur.user_id = #{userId}
select sr.id, sr.name, sr.description from sys_role sr where sr.deleted = 0 and sr.id not in (select sur.role_id from sys_user_role sur where sur.user_id = #{userId})

select sr.id, sr.name, sr.description, sr.create_time, sr.update_time from sys_role sr left join sys_resources_role srer on srer.role_id = sr.id where sr.deleted = 0
and srer.resources_id = #{resourcesId}
select sr.id, sr.name, sr.description from sys_role sr where sr.deleted = 0 and sr.id not in (select srer.role_id from sys_resources_role srer where srer.resources_id = #{resourcesId})
